entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning late in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 12 March 2023
